name: Resize an RGB square
description:
This is an RGB square, you can resize it using your mouse.

You can now choose a specific color for the square :)

!note: the files are not compiled meaning that only people that have visual studio and the C++ library installed can run it.

If you want the RGB colors to switch slower or faster, go to Square.h and change the value of rgbSpeed. Make sure to use odd numbers unless you want the square to switch from red to green only.

Btw when you resize the square after choosing a color it acts a bit crappy and that's cuz of the Sleep(number) I put to slow down the reticle when moving up and down, which actually worked but the problem is that it also slows the resizing process.

the controls are in the controls file.

enjoy
